title: jeremypwr

created_time: March 13, 2023, 03:05:57 PMLast edit: March 14, 2023, 03:32:56 PM by jeremypwr
content: UFC 286Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 2 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 1 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: 0.5 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-286-edwards-vs-usman-3/matchesMatches(2 points each)15. Leon Edwards vs. Kamaru Usman 14. Justin Gaethje vs. Rafael Fiziev13. Gunnar Nelson vs. Bryan Barberena12. Jennifer Maia vs. Casey O’Neill11. Marvin Vettori vs. Roman Dolidze(1 point each)10. Jack Shore vs. Makwan Amirkhani9. Chris Duncan vs. Omar Morales8. Sam Patterson vs. Yanal Ashmoz7. Muhammad Mokaev vs. Jafel Filho6. Lerone Murphy vs. Gabriel Santos5. Christian Leroy Duncan vs. Dusko Todorovic4. Jake Hadley vs. Malcolm Gordon3. Joanne Wood vs. Luana Carolina2. Jai Herbert vs. Ludovit Klein1. Juliana Miller vs. Veronica MacedoHow many matches will NOT go the Full DistanceExample15. Leon Edwards 14. Justin Gaethje 13. Gunnar Nelson 12. Jennifer Maia 11. Marvin Vettori 10. Jack Shore 9. Chris Duncan 8. Sam Patterson 7. Muhammad Mokaev 6. Lerone Murphy 5. Christian Leroy Duncan 4. Jake Hadley 3. Joanne Wood 2. Jai Herbert 1. Juliana Miller NOT go the Full Distance 8(Small print)* Must be active in Sports betting and/or Sports betting discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.created_time: March 13, 2023, 03:19:04 PMLast edit: March 14, 2023, 03:43:56 PM by jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
